After, please write three to five bullets compelling statements about what you learned from Justin, through his writing: Justin McDonald is a copywriter who is passionate about the art of handwriting old ads. He rewrites hundreds of them daily, long-hand, for fun. His love for this practice is inspired by the belief that it helps him develop his copywriting skills and stay connected to the roots of the industry. Justin's daily handwritten ads can be found on his website and social media platforms, providing a unique perspective on the history of advertising and its relevance to modern-day marketing.

Justin's dedication to the craft of copywriting extends beyond his daily handwritten ads. He offers a monthly printed newsletter for $100 that covers a range of topics such as copywriting, small business management, entrepreneurship, personal selling, and personal development. He also provides daily email tips on these subjects, giving his subscribers insights into his copywriting process and approach to business. Additionally, he takes on freelance copywriting projects and consulting sessions remotely through various communication channels.

Justin's expertise in copywriting has also led him to create his own eBooks and publish a book on the subject. He frequently offers special deals and promotions for his products, ensuring that his subscribers have access to the latest and most relevant information in the industry. Furthermore, Justin engages in affiliate marketing and joint ventures, expanding his reach and building his network of contacts.

In conclusion, Justin McDonald is a copywriter who is dedicated to developing his skills and sharing his knowledge with others. His daily handwritten ads and newsletter provide a unique perspective on the history of advertising and its relevance to modern marketing. His commitment to offering valuable insights on copywriting, small business management, entrepreneurship, personal selling, and personal development make him an excellent resource for anyone looking to improve their skills in these areas. With his range of products and services, Justin offers something for everyone in the world of copywriting and beyond.
